page.title: 15St. George's Retreat, B.Hill
page.content:
The impressions of a nine year old visitor.
St.George's Retreat is a place where old people go to die. My auntie took me there and showed me round .I met an old lady there who looked rather sad. I think she was sad because she did not want to die. She cheered up after a little while because she had not seen a young face for a long time. I also met her husband and he was rather upset as well. On the north side of St.George's Retreat there is a chapel. I think it would be a nice place to die but I think there shoud be some young people to brighten the place up.
